Carbon Tracker helps you track your carbon emissions on your phone. By tracking your emissions, you can be a responsible human being. 

This app was developed by: 
Group Khaki (Parker, Richard, Caleb, Sankait)

Assets
Main Logo Tire vector image:
ClipartFest.com 
Main Logo Font:
http://www.dafont.com/carbon.font

http://www.tooopen.com/view/905025.html

http://www.tooopen.com/view/882842.html
Please long click on a journey to delete it
Please select a date by clicking button below
You\'ve entered %1$d journeys today. Want to add more?

Good! Your footprint today is below average. Do you want to enter more Journeys?
You haven\'t entered any journey today. Would you like to enter one now?
Good evening. Would you like to add footprint today?
Please choose each of the attributes above to filter among all the cars we know.
Please select a bill to edit it, press and hold to delete:
It takes over 200 tree-day to compensate for the CO2 emitted
It takes less than 0.1 tree-day to compensate for the CO2 emitted.
It takes over 200 tree-year to compensate for the CO2 emitted.
It takes less than 0.1 tree-year to compensate for the CO2 emitted.

Alternatives to driving. When possible, walk or ride your bike in order to avoid carbon emissions completely. Carpooling and public transportation drastically reduce CO2 emissions by spreading them out over many riders.

Studies have shown up to 30% of the difference in miles per gallon (MPG) is due to driving habits alone. You could save more than a ton of CO2 per year by:Anticipating your stops and starts,Maintaining a steady speed,Accelerating slowly and smoothly,Driving the speed limit
Your car have a large car age, please replace your air, oil and fuel filters according to schedule.
You took bus, good move to protect our earth! Good for you!
Walk for earth, for your health! Good for you!
Skytrain is a clean transMode, good for you!
Please select a Route to delete.
Please select a Route to edit.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected bill?

"Your total driving distance is %1$fkm, In long distance driving,keep your tires properly inflated (just this can save 400-700 pounds of CO2 per year).
"Your total driving distance is %1$fkm. Just walk, for earth, for your health."

Your electric Cost is a little bit high, do like your Mom said- turn things off. If you’re going away or not using an item for awhile, unplug it to prevent “vampire” energy loss from electricity usage on standby.
